column3: Strength - How much difficulty do you have in lifting and carrying 10 pounds?
Walking - How much difficulty do you have walking across a room?
How much difficulty do you have transferring from a chair or bed?
Climbing - How much difficulty do you have climbing a flight of 10 stairs?
Falls - How many times have you fallen in the past year?
TOTAL SCORE:   => 4 is predictive of sarcopenia and poor outcomes.
